Allen Iverson scored a season-high 51 points but the Lakers had three players, led by Kobe Bryant 's 25, score 20-plus points to give the Lakers a 111-107 win over the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday night. Carmelo Anthony had 26 points and eight rebounds and Marcus Camby had 20 rebounds for the Nuggets. "We absorbed a lot of points from Allen Iverson , Lakers coach Phil Jackson said.
